title: Apollo’s Fourth-Quarter Profit Falls
sub_head: Investment firm’s private-equity portfolio appreciated by 5.2% in quarter, falling short of 11% gain for S&P 500
body:
Apollo Global Management Inc. reported lower fourth-quarter profit, as its private-equity portfolio underperformed the broader market.
The New York investment firm posted net income of $243.6 million, or 91 cents per share, down from $434.1 million, or $1.80, a year earlier.
